title: My Google Pixel via IMEI no. 352531086580667 was bought in June 2018. Its battery is not charging.
content: Till a month back, the battery was being charged normally. Then it started getting exhausted in Two hours without even using. For the last Three days it is not charging at all.My email address is : archvm@yahoo.com.Please help.  My address: R-7, South Extension Part-2, New Delhi-110049, India
